posts.title: Mod Minecraft One Block 4
posts.description: Minecraft Mod One Block - New Experience in Minecraft World
posts.content: Minecraft One Block Mod is an addition that brings a different and interesting experience to the world of Minecraft. With this mod, you will discover new worlds inside a single block. The challenge starts when you start your adventure inside the block. Within these single blocks, you'll find different layers that feature a variety of resources and creatures. Starting from farming, pets, to challenging enemies, everything is in the block. The One Block mod gives you the freedom to explore and build within the block. You can explore and get the necessary resources to expand your territory. Get ready to face new challenges and discover the magic hidden in this single block. With this mod, you can transform your Minecraft gaming experience into something completely new and exciting. Enjoy a unique adventure and exploration in a limited environment full of surprises. Explore the world of Minecraft with the One Block mod and discover the uniqueness and magic in this single block. Prepare yourself for an exciting adventure and face new challenges that await in it. Download the Minecraft One Block mod now and start a new adventure in the world of Minecraft!

posts.title: Prehistoric Rift
posts.description: Greetings fellow human beings, and welcome to the world of Prehistoric Rift! This addon aims to expand upon the gameplay of Minecraft by adding prehistoric creatures and enhance...
posts.content:
Greetings fellow human beings, and welcome to the world of Prehistoric Rift! This addon aims to expand upon the gameplay of Minecraft by adding prehistoric creatures and enhances the vanilla experience!
Before playing with this addon, turn on commands, holiday creator features, creation of custom biomes, additional modding capabilities, upcoming creator features, enable gametest framework, and experimental molang features in your world.
Please note that when distributing the addon, only use the mcpedl page or the github related links. You can also make a video about this addon but don't make it a dumb clickbaity one.
If you spot any bugs or if you have suggestions you can post them in the bugtracker on GitHub. Just make sure to browse the area first. You may also feel free to join my discord server where you can casually hang out, or the twitter account for updates.
The addon also has a wiki where all information about it is documented at due to the amount of things this addon has so far, which you can read if you like. You're also free to contribute anything useful there.
This addon is compatible with Borgy's Mobs btw, but in order to make them work together you need to download the compatibilizer.
If you really like this addon btw, you can donate to me on Ko-Fi. You're not obligated to donate, but it at least motivates me to continue working on this addon and any others that I may make.

posts.content: Minecraft One Block Mod is an addition that brings a different and interesting experience to the world of Minecraft. With this mod, you will discover new worlds inside a single block. The challenge starts when you start your adventure inside the block. Within these single blocks, you'll find different layers that feature a variety of resources and creatures. Starting from farming, pets, to challenging enemies, everything is in the block. The One Block mod gives you the freedom to explore and build within the block. You can explore and get the necessary resources to expand your territory. Get ready to face new challenges and discover the magic hidden in this single block. With this mod, you can transform your Minecraft gaming experience into something completely new and exciting. Enjoy a unique adventure and exploration in a limited environment full of surprises. Explore the world of Minecraft with the One Block mod and discover the uniqueness and magic in this single block. Prepare yourself for an exciting adventure and face new challenges that await in it. Download the Minecraft One Block mod now and start a new adventure in the world of Minecraft!

posts.title: Mod Minecraft One Block 7
posts.description: Minecraft Mod One Block - New Experience in Minecraft World
posts.content: Minecraft One Block Mod is an addition that brings a different and interesting experience to the world of Minecraft. With this mod, you will discover new worlds inside a single block. The challenge starts when you start your adventure inside the block. Within these single blocks, you'll find different layers that feature a variety of resources and creatures. Starting from farming, pets, to challenging enemies, everything is in the block. The One Block mod gives you the freedom to explore and build within the block. You can explore and get the necessary resources to expand your territory. Get ready to face new challenges and discover the magic hidden in this single block. With this mod, you can transform your Minecraft gaming experience into something completely new and exciting. Enjoy a unique adventure and exploration in a limited environment full of surprises. Explore the world of Minecraft with the One Block mod and discover the uniqueness and magic in this single block. Prepare yourself for an exciting adventure and face new challenges that await in it. Download the Minecraft One Block mod now and start a new adventure in the world of Minecraft!

posts.description: Minecraft Mod One Block - New Experience in Minecraft World

The challenge starts when you start your adventure inside the block. Within these single blocks, you'll find different layers that feature a variety of resources and creatures. Starting from farming, pets, to challenging enemies, everything is in the block. The One Block mod gives you the freedom to explore and build within the block. You can explore and get the necessary resources to expand your territory. Get ready to face new challenges and discover the magic hidden in this single block. With this mod, you can change your Minecraft gaming experienceinto something completely new and interesting. Enjoy a unique adventure and exploration in a limited environment full of surprises. Explore the world of Minecraft with the One Block mod and discover the uniqueness and magic in this single block. Prepare yourself for an exciting adventure and face new challenges that await in it. Download the Minecraft One Block mod now and start a new adventure in the world of Minecraft!

posts.title: Minecraft Mod One Block - New Experience in Minecraft World
posts.description: Minecraft Mod One Block - New Experience in Minecraft World
posts.content: Minecraft One Block Mod is an addition that brings a different and interesting experience to the world of Minecraft. With this mod, you will discover new worlds inside a single block. The challenge starts when you start your adventure inside the block. Within these single blocks, you'll find different layers that feature a variety of resources and creatures. Starting from farming, pets, to challenging enemies, everything is in the block. The One Block mod gives you the freedom to explore and build within the block. You can explore and get the necessary resources to expand your territory. Get ready to face new challenges and discover the magic hidden in this single block. With this mod, you can transform your Minecraft gaming experience into something completely new and exciting. Enjoy a unique adventure and exploration in a limited environment full of surprises. Explore the world of Minecraft with the One Block mod and discover the uniqueness and magic in this single block. Prepare yourself for an exciting adventure and face new challenges that await in it. Download the Minecraft One Block mod now and start a new adventure in the world of Minecraft!

posts.title: YRed's Swords: Reference Update
posts.description: Hello! This is my first addon. It consists of several swords, of which I tried to make balanced, but since it's my first time making a mod, they might be overpowered, or they mi...
posts.content:
Hello! This is my first addon. It consists of several swords, of which I tried to make balanced, but since it's my first time making a mod, they might be overpowered, or they might suck. Also, I'm new to coding addons, so I haven't learned how to set up durability yet, meaning that all of these weapons are unbreakable, and i might keep it that way.
Also, this addon doesn't use player.json, so feel free to use it with any other mods, it won't break your world :)
There are different "Tiers" of swords based on how many times you have to craft to get them. For example,
Tier 1 Swords = swords crafted with basic materials, Tier 2 Swords = swords crafted with two tier one swords or a tier one sword with some other materials, Tier 3 Swords = swords crafted with two tier two swords or a tier two with other materials, etc.

Starting from farming, pets, to challenging enemies, everything is in the block. The One Block mod gives you the freedom to explore and build within the block. You can explore and get the necessary resources to expand your territory. Get ready to face new challenges and discover the magic hidden in this single block. With this mod, you can transform your Minecraft gaming experience into something completely new and exciting. Enjoy a unique adventure and exploration in a limited environment full of surprises. Explore the world of Minecraft with the One Block mod and discover the uniqueness and magic in this single block. Prepare yourself for an exciting adventure and face new challenges that await in it. Download the Minecraft One Block mod now and start a new adventure in the world of Minecraft!

posts.title: Forge Tools Addon (for 1.20.x)
posts.description: Forge Tools Addon add new ways to create tools in Minecraft Bedrock.
posts.content: With this addon, you can create tools with your parts of different ores, for example, a diamond pick and iron rod.

posts.title: Minecraft Mod One Block - New Experience in Minecraft World
posts.description: Minecraft Mod One Block - New Experience in Minecraft World
posts.content: Skin Mermaid Mod MCPE gives a magical and mysterious feel to the game. Every detail in this skin is carefully designed, from the graceful facial expressions, to the long wavy hair, to the beautiful tail fins. Players can choose from a variety of color and design variants to customize their character's appearance according to their taste and desired playing style. Not only does it offer a charming appearance, the Mermaid Mod MCPE skin can also bring a new experience in exploring the world of Minecraft. Players can swim elegantly through the waters, explore the seas, and even interact with other sea creatures. These skins create a unique fantasy atmosphere and enrich the experience of playing Minecraft Pocket Edition.

posts.title: Inca Guardian V:1.1 [1-19.80-1.20.12]
posts.description: This Warden isn't that dissimilar to the original in terms of speed, strength, and health; since I have not yet modified it in that aspect; This plugin is created with the idea that they would use it for some type of minigame in case they did not want to use only 1 type of Warden but if the demand is enough, it promises to bring even better Wardens.
posts.content: This warden has his own spawn egg so it will be easier for them.The way they would invoke it with commands would be | /invoke my name:inca_axolotl |The texture of the Heart of this Warden is very adorable even if the bearer is not XD.

posts.title: Alien's Boss Music
posts.description: This addon adds boss music that plays when your near a boss.
posts.content: This addon uses functions to play the music so you don't have to turn on any experiments, just add the resource pack, the behaviour pack, and you'll be all set.

posts.title: Among Us Bossfight v1.0 [BETA]
posts.description: Hello! Welcome to Among Us Bossfight! This map features an Among Us Character to fight from a certain game called Among Us. The map even has an arena to fight inand a hub for kits to fight with!
posts.content: This map features an arena to fight a boss: Among Us. About these cute dudes: 1. They will attack [ just like every other boss ] 2. You can breed / tame them with almost any food in the game and there will be cute babies! 3. They will run really fast at you if you're close enough to one of them. 4. They will also spawn llamas for protectors!

posts.title: Legacy Parkour Map NEW
posts.description: This is unique map with cool parkour adventures and this is only on MCPEDL
posts.content: You have to go through several unique and interesting parkour levels that will not let you get bored. Jump, overcome obstacles and have fun with this map!
